_description: Common parameters shared across all 5 methods (SFL, USFL, SCAFFOLD, GAS, MultiSFL).
_dataset: cifar10 | fmnist | mnist | cinic | cifar100 | svhn
_model: resnet18_flex | resnet18 | resnet18_image_style | alexnet | vgg11 | distilbert
_alpha: Dirichlet concentration. Lower = more Non-IID. (0.1: extreme, 0.3: moderate, 10.0: near-IID)
_labels_per_client: Number of distinct classes each client holds (shard_dirichlet distributer).
_split_layer: Model split point. e.g. layer1 | layer1.1.bn2 | layer2 (ResNet18).
_weight_decay: L2 regularization. Currently supported by GAS only; SFL/MultiSFL ignore.
_clip_grad: Enable gradient clipping. Supported by GAS and MultiSFL; SFL ignores.
_clip_grad_max_norm: Max norm for gradient clipping (used when clip_grad is true).
_use_sfl_transform: true: ToTensor-only (no augment) | false: standard augmentation. Supported by GAS/MultiSFL.
_use_torchvision_init: Load torchvision ResNet18 weights for split model init. Supported by GAS/MultiSFL.
_use_full_epochs: true: iterate entire dataset per round | false: fixed local_epochs steps. Supported by GAS/MultiSFL.
_g_measurement_mode: single: 1st step only | k_batch: first K batches | accumulated: full round average.
_g_measurement_k: Number of batches to collect in k_batch mode.
_use_variance_g: true: variance-based G (std of per-client scores) | false: distance-based (default).
_g_measure_frequency: Measure G every N rounds. All frameworks use frequency-based timing.
_g_oracle_mode: global: single global model oracle | individual: per-model oracle then average.
_drift_sample_interval: Accumulate drift every N local steps. 1 = every step.
_section_probe: === Experiment A Probe Set Q (central direction) ===
_client_schedule_path: Fixed client schedule JSON for Experiment A (P_t fixed across methods).
_probe_indices_path: Optional JSON/TXT indices file for fixed probe set. Empty = no file.
_probe_num_samples: If >0 and no indices file, sample fixed probe subset of this size with probe_seed. (CIFAR-10 recommendation: 5000)
_probe_max_batches: Number of probe batches per round for c^t estimation. (CIFAR-10 recommendation: 10 for 5000/500)
_probe_class_balanced: When true, sample probe subset class-balanced when labels are available.
_probe_class_balanced_batches: When true, reorder probe subset so each probe batch is class-balanced when possible.
